title: Plan a movie night
description: Complete with popcorn and cozy blankets for a fun and relaxing evening.

title: Organise a decluttering session for my closet
description: Sort through clothes and belongings to declutter and donate items I no longer need or use.

title: Complete presentation slides
description: Create slides covering key points for the upcoming presentation. :)

title: Read a chapter of a book before bed
description: Wind down before sleep by immersing yourself in a good book for a peaceful night's rest.

title: Attend a local cultural event or festival
description: Immerse myself in the vibrant culture of my community by attending a local event or festival showcasing music, art, or food.

title: Plan a picnic in the park with homemade snacks
description: Pack a picnic basket with delicious homemade snacks and spend a leisurely afternoon soaking up the sun in the park.

title: Learn a new hobby or skill over semester break
description: Dedicate time to learning something new, whether it's painting, knitting, or coding tutorials online.

title: Write a letter or postcard
description: Write to my grandad in Spain

title: Practice mindfulness meditation for 10 minutes
description: Set aside time to practice mindfulness meditation to cultivate inner peace and reduce stress.

title: Take a nature walk and appreciate the beauty around me
description: Spend time outdoors, soaking in the beauty of nature.
